original_text: Behold, is it not of the Lord of hosts that the people shall labour in the very fire, and the people shall weary themselves for very vanity?
korean_text: 민족들이 불탈 것으로 수고하는 것과 나라들이 헛된 일로 피곤하게 되는 것이 만군의 여호와께로 말미암음이 아니냐

sentences.original_text: Behold, is it not of the Lord of hosts
sentences.korean_translation: 보라, 만군의 여호와께로부터 말미암은 것이 아니냐

sentences.original_text: that the people shall labour in the very fire
and the people shall weary themselves
